name: Cold Lead Prototype
description:
This prototype is aimed at showcasing the general idea of the game.

The full project is intended to work for VR and it will be consisting of a Matrix/John Wick style constant fight in a surreal virtual jungle.

The player will be moving through each area, constantly finding themselves surrounded by a variety of enemy types they will have to take out quickly and prioritizing targets.

All of this, while dodging incoming bullets, anti-human trip mines and suicide bombers running towards them.
